name: Spoopy (chie_ander)
description:
An abandoned Mortuary deep in the woods looks particularly eerie on the night of Halloween. You got dared to go check it out on your own. What will you find?




4 people worked on this project:

Sound Designer: Kyle - HOME | kyle-chang

UE4 Developer: William

Artist: Mike - ArtStation - Michael Fiorentino

Artist: Chie - ArtStation - Chie Andersen
